channel.title: Getting source to work with client?
channel.description:
i downloaded a new client and i dont know how to get the source to work with the client, so that when i log on it will be using the source.
cheers :)

item.title: Getting source to work with client?
item.dc:creator: @undertaxxx undertaxxx
item.description:
@undertaxxx wrote:

well… what source? 317/508?

the cache must be “the same as” the source so 317,508,…

and its not the source that should work with the client… its the client that should work with the source.

So just try connecting and see what happens. If you keep on getting errors and such, you’re using the wrong client

Read full topic
item.source: Getting source to work with client?

item.title: Getting source to work with client?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

The moparscape client will work with almost any server.
